post.author: 이홍식
post.content: 1. Don't miss the boat. 2. Remember that we are all in the same boat. 3. Plan ahead. It wasn't raining when Noah built the Ark. 4. Stay fit. When you're 600 years old, some may ask you to do something really big. 5. Don't listen to critics; just to get on with the job that needs to be done. 6. Build your future on high ground. 7. For safety's sake, travel in pairs. 8. Speed isn't always on advantage. The snails were on board with the cheetahs. 9. When you're stressed, float a while. 10. Remember, the Ark was built by amateurs; the Titanics by professionals. 11. No matter the storm, when you are with God, there's always a rainbow waiting!
post.title: Everything I need to know, I learned from Noah's Ark...
